results.title: Half sister
results.brief_description: Half Sister tells of a seven-year-old boy’s fascination at watching, from the shadows, his rebellious, 16-year-old half sister undress after glamming herself up for a high school production, ignoring her father’s furious pounding on the bathroom door.

results.title: Robotech: the Macross saga. 3. Homecoming
results.creator_credit: Carl Macek, Harmony Gold and Tatsunoko Production Co
results.brief_description: At the end of the twentieth century evidence of an advanced alien civilization emerges when an enormous spaceship crashes on earth. The United Earth government is formed to combat impending invasion and to research the advanced and dangerous alien technologies. In this American futuristic anime television series Rick, Ben, Max, and Lisa are four earthlings doing battle in cyber-space, whilst dealing with their complex romantic lives. This disc, entitled “Homecoming” contains six episodes from the “Macross Saga”. “Blue wind”: having escaped the clutches of the Zentraedi, the fabulous foursome present their report about the enemy’s potential, to their disbelieving cohorts. “Gloval’s report”: with the giant battle fortress safely returned to earth, Captain Gloval reflects upon the skirmishes, combats and strategies that have marked the past two years. “Homecoming”: Rick is secretly engaged by Minmay to fly her back to Japan. Lisa and Gloval struggle to convince the United Earth government of the danger posed by the Zentraedi. “Battle cry”: the Zentraedi plans a secret attack on the SDF-1. “Phantasm”: Rick lies in hospital in a critical condition, reflecting upon his tumultuous romantic emotions. “Farewell, big brother”: as Rick recuperates the Zentraedi threat looms large once again.

results.title: Cuttlefish dreams: Hyper parsnip bitches
results.brief_description: This high energy animation looks and feels like an arcade game experience. Jumping, kicking characters fight a gory path through a series of game worlds battling a series of ‘evil freaks’. And there’s cuttlefish

results.title: Romance of transportation
results.creator_credit: Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A light-hearted, whimsical look at the way an effective transportation system has been developed in Canada, despite the difficulties of vast distances and natural obstacles. An animated film by skilled animator Colin Low.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: Robocop 2 (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Irvin Kershner, Jon Davison and Orion Pictures Corporation
results.brief_description: In the pollution-ridden future, the city of Detroit is crumbling into decay and poverty. The drug-lords have introduced a new drug, Nuke, which is so seductive a majority of the population have become addicted to it. The only solution to the spiralling catastrophe of crime is the superhuman strength of Robocop, the world’s most efficient crime-fighting machine. This fast- paced, action-crammed sequel features superb special effects. Stars Peter Weller and Nancy Allen.

results.title: Rolling Stone: 20 Years of Rock N' Roll
results.brief_description: This video includes interviews with: Mick Jagger, George Harrison, Jerry Garcia, Sting, David Bowie, Tina Turner, Joni Mitchell, Lou Reed, George Clinton, Robbie Robertson, Aretha Franklin, David Byrne, Smokey Robinson, and Dennis Hopper. It also features performances by: The Beatles, Jefferson Airplane, Otis Redding, The Police, Aretha Franklin, The Who, Bob Dylan, The Band, The Rolling Stones, The Doors, Led Zeppelin, T Rex, David Bowie, Bruce Springsteen, Jackson Browne, and The Eagles.

results.title: Roller skate safely
results.brief_description: Illustrates the importance of protective wear in roller skating and also stresses the importance of routine safety and maintenance checks to skates. A variety of skates are shown, with suggestions for purchase or rental. Shows the important basic techniques of how to stop and how to fall.
